member.name: T:CustomToolkit.BaseCodeGenerator
member.summary: A managed wrapper for VS's concept of an IVsSingleFileGenerator which is a custom tool invoked at design time which can take any file as an input and provide any file as output.

member.name: M:CustomToolkit.BaseCodeGenerator.Microsoft#VisualStudio#Shell#Interop#IVsSingleFileGenerator#DefaultExtension(System.String@)
member.summary: Implements the IVsSingleFileGenerator.DefaultExtension method. Returns the extension of the generated file
member.param: Out parameter, will hold the extension that is to be given to the output file name. The returned extension must include a leading period
member.returns: S_OK if successful, E_FAIL if not

member.name: M:CustomToolkit.BaseCodeGenerator.Microsoft#VisualStudio#Shell#Interop#IVsSingleFileGenerator#Generate(System.String,System.String,System.String,System.IntPtr[],System.UInt32@,Microsoft.VisualStudio.Shell.Interop.IVsGeneratorProgress)
member.summary: Implements the IVsSingleFileGenerator.Generate method. Executes the transformation and returns the newly generated output file, whenever a custom tool is loaded, or the input file is saved
member.param: The full path of the input file. May be a null reference (Nothing in Visual Basic) in future releases of Visual Studio, so generators should not rely on this value

The contents of the input file. This is either a UNICODE BSTR (if the input file is text) or a binary BSTR (if the input file is binary). If the input file is a text file, the project system automatically converts the BSTR to UNICODE

This parameter is meaningful only for custom tools that generate code. It represents the namespace into which the generated code will be placed. If the parameter is not a null reference (Nothing in Visual Basic) and not empty, the custom tool can use the following syntax to enclose the generated code

[out] Returns an array of bytes to be written to the generated file. You must include UNICODE or UTF-8 signature bytes in the returned byte array, as this is a raw stream. The memory for rgbOutputFileContents must be allocated using the .NET Framework call, System.Runtime.InteropServices.AllocCoTaskMem, or the equivalent Win32 system call, CoTaskMemAlloc. The project system is responsible for freeing this memory
[out] Returns the count of bytes in the rgbOutputFileContent array
A reference to the IVsGeneratorProgress interface through which the generator can report its progress to the project system
member.returns: If the method succeeds, it returns S_OK. If it fails, it returns E_FAIL

member.name: M:CustomToolkit.BaseCodeGenerator.GetDefaultExtension
member.summary: Gets the default extension for this generator
member.returns: String with the default extension for this generator

member.name: M:CustomToolkit.BaseCodeGenerator.GenerateCode(System.String)
member.summary: The method that does the actual work of generating code given the input file
member.returns: The generated code file as a byte-array

member.name: M:CustomToolkit.BaseCodeGenerator.GeneratorError(System.UInt32,System.String,System.UInt32,System.UInt32)
member.summary: Method that will communicate an error via the shell callback mechanism

member.name: M:CustomToolkit.BaseCodeGenerator.GeneratorWarning(System.UInt32,System.String,System.UInt32,System.UInt32)
member.summary: Method that will communicate a warning via the shell callback mechanism

member.name: P:CustomToolkit.BaseCodeGenerator.FileNameSpace
member.summary: Namespace for the file

member.name: P:CustomToolkit.BaseCodeGenerator.InputFilePath
member.summary: File-path for the input file

member.name: P:CustomToolkit.BaseCodeGenerator.CodeGeneratorProgress
member.summary: Interface to the VS shell object we use to tell our progress while we are generating

member.name: T:Microsoft.VisualStudio.Shell.CodeGeneratorRegistrationAttribute
member.summary: This attribute adds a custom file generator registry entry for specific file type. For Example: [HKEY_LOCAL_MACHINE\SOFTWARE\Microsoft\VisualStudio\9.0\Generators\ {fae04ec1-301f-11d3-bf4b-00c04f79efbc}\MyGenerator] "CLSID"="{AAAA53CC-3D4F-40a2-BD4D-4F3419755476}" "GeneratesDesignTimeSource" = d'1'

member.name: M:Microsoft.VisualStudio.Shell.CodeGeneratorRegistrationAttribute.#ctor(System.Type,System.String,System.String)
member.summary: Creates a new CodeGeneratorRegistrationAttribute attribute to register a custom code generator for the provided context.
member.param: The type of Code generator. Type that implements IVsSingleFileGenerator
The context GUID this code generator would appear under.

member.name: M:Microsoft.VisualStudio.Shell.CodeGeneratorRegistrationAttribute.Register(Microsoft.VisualStudio.Shell.RegistrationAttribute.RegistrationContext)
member.summary: Called to register this attribute with the given context. The context contains the location where the registration inforomation should be placed. It also contains other information such as the type being registered and path information.

member.name: M:Microsoft.VisualStudio.Shell.CodeGeneratorRegistrationAttribute.Unregister(Microsoft.VisualStudio.Shell.RegistrationAttribute.RegistrationContext)
member.summary: Unregister this file extension.

member.name: P:Microsoft.VisualStudio.Shell.CodeGeneratorRegistrationAttribute.GeneratorType
member.summary: Get the generator Type

member.name: P:Microsoft.VisualStudio.Shell.CodeGeneratorRegistrationAttribute.ContextGuid
member.summary: Get the Guid representing the project type

member.name: P:Microsoft.VisualStudio.Shell.CodeGeneratorRegistrationAttribute.GeneratorGuid
member.summary: Get the Guid representing the generator type

member.name: P:Microsoft.VisualStudio.Shell.CodeGeneratorRegistrationAttribute.GeneratesDesignTimeSource
member.summary: Get or Set the GeneratesDesignTimeSource value

member.name: P:Microsoft.VisualStudio.Shell.CodeGeneratorRegistrationAttribute.GeneratesSharedDesignTimeSource
member.summary: Get or Set the GeneratesSharedDesignTimeSource value

member.name: P:Microsoft.VisualStudio.Shell.CodeGeneratorRegistrationAttribute.GeneratorName
member.summary: Gets the Generator name

member.name: P:Microsoft.VisualStudio.Shell.CodeGeneratorRegistrationAttribute.GeneratorRegKeyName
member.summary: Gets the Generator reg key name under

member.name: P:Microsoft.VisualStudio.Shell.CodeGeneratorRegistrationAttribute.GeneratorRegKey
member.summary: Property that gets the generator base key name

member.name: T:MarkdownForVS.Strings
member.summary: A strongly-typed resource class, for looking up localized strings, etc.

member.name: P:MarkdownForVS.Strings.ResourceManager
member.summary: Returns the cached ResourceManager instance used by this class.

member.name: P:MarkdownForVS.Strings.Culture
member.summary: Overrides the current thread's CurrentUICulture property for all resource lookups using this strongly typed resource class.

member.name: P:MarkdownForVS.Strings.BadClassMemberName
member.summary: Looks up a localized string similar to This generator only supports 'Constant' and 'Variable' child nodes for a 'Class' node. Found: {0}.

member.name: P:MarkdownForVS.Strings.BadTypeAccess
member.summary: Looks up a localized string similar to For types, the access attribute must be 'public' or 'internal'. Found: {0}.

member.name: P:MarkdownForVS.Strings.BadVariableAccess
member.summary: Looks up a localized string similar to For 'Variable' nodes, the 'access' attribute must be 'public', 'protected', or 'private'. Found: {0}.

member.name: P:MarkdownForVS.Strings.ClassMemberNoName
member.summary: Looks up a localized string similar to 'Constant' and 'Variable' child nodes of a 'Class' node must have a 'name' attribute.

member.name: P:MarkdownForVS.Strings.ClassMemberNoType
member.summary: Looks up a localized string similar to 'Constant' and 'Variable' child nodes of a 'Class' node must have a 'type' attribute.

member.name: P:MarkdownForVS.Strings.ClassNodeNoName
member.summary: Looks up a localized string similar to Each 'Class' node must have a name attribute.

member.name: P:MarkdownForVS.Strings.ConstantNoValue
member.summary: Looks up a localized string similar to 'Constant' nodes must have a 'value' attribute.

member.name: P:MarkdownForVS.Strings.EnumInvalidChild
member.summary: Looks up a localized string similar to 'Enum' nodes can only have 'EnumMember' child nodes. Found: {0}.

member.name: P:MarkdownForVS.Strings.EnumMemberNodeNoName
member.summary: Looks up a localized string similar to Each 'EnumMember' node must have a name attribute.

member.name: P:MarkdownForVS.Strings.EnumMemberValueMissing
member.summary: Looks up a localized string similar to If 'Enum' node has flagsAttribute="true", each 'EnumMember' child must have a value attribute.

member.name: P:MarkdownForVS.Strings.EnumNodeNoName
member.summary: Looks up a localized string similar to Each 'Enum' node must have a name attribute.

member.name: P:MarkdownForVS.Strings.EnumNoMembers
member.summary: Looks up a localized string similar to 'Enum' nodes must have at least one 'EnumMember' child node.

member.name: P:MarkdownForVS.Strings.GetDefaultExtensionFailed
member.summary: Looks up a localized string similar to The call to GetDefaultExtension() has failed due to the exception:.

member.name: P:MarkdownForVS.Strings.InvalidRoot
member.summary: Looks up a localized string similar to Expected root element: 'Types'. Found: {0} .

member.name: P:MarkdownForVS.Strings.InvalidType
member.summary: Looks up a localized string similar to The 'Types' root node should only contain 'Class' or 'Enum' child nodes. Found: {0}.

member.name: P:MarkdownForVS.Strings.NoTypes
member.summary: Looks up a localized string similar to The 'Types' root element must contain at least one 'Class' or 'Enum' child.

member.name: P:MarkdownForVS.Strings.StaticConstant
member.summary: Looks up a localized string similar to 'Constant' nodes can not have the 'static' attribute.
